sqlMap.insert: insert into t_user( USERID,ACCOUNTNO,password, name,email,phone ) values( id_seq.nextval,#accountNo#,#password#, #name#,#email#,#phone# )
sqlMap.select:
select t.USERID,t.ACCOUNTNO,t.password, t.name,t.email,t.phone from (select * from t_user limit #start#,#end#
and ACCOUNTNO like '%$accountNo$%'
and name like '%$name$%'
) t
select t.USERID,t.ACCOUNTNO,t.password, t.name,t.email,t.phone from (select t.*,ROWNUM RN from t_user t) t where t.name like '%$name$%' and RN>#start# and RN<=#end#
select t.USERID,t.ACCOUNTNO,t.password, t.name,t.email,t.phone from (select t.*,ROWNUM RN from t_user t) t where RN>#start# and RN<=#end# and t.ACCOUNTNO like '%$accountNo$%'

select t.USERID,t.ACCOUNTNO,t.password, t.name,t.email,t.phone from (select t.*,ROWNUM RN from t_user t) t where RN>#start# and RN<=#end# and (t.name like '%$name$%' or ACCOUNTNO like '%$accountNo$%')
select password from t_user where ACCOUNTNO=#accountNo#

select count(*) from t_user where 1=1
and ACCOUNTNO like '%$accountNo$%'
and name like '%$name$%'
